item.title: Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go - 14-inch Chrome Laptop
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go is a lightweight and durable Chromebook designed for portability and productivity. Key features include 14-inch display, up to 12 hours battery life, military-grade design, and Wi-Fi 6.

item.title: Lenovo 100e Chromebook Gen 4 82W0001EUS - Chrome OS Laptop
item.description: The Lenovo 100e Chromebook Gen 4 is a compact and durable device suitable for educational purposes or light computing tasks.

item.title: HP Fortis G1m 11.6-inch Rugged Clamshell Chromebook
item.description: Rugged Chromebook for everyday use with 8 GB memory, an 11.6" HD screen, and durable build designed for school or work environments.

item.title: HP Fortis G1m Rugged Clamshell Chromebook B5JJ9UT#ABA
item.description: The HP Fortis G1m is a rugged 11.6" Chromebook designed for durability and efficient performance. Powered by an octa-core ARM Cortex processor and running Chrome OS, it meets the demands of basic multitasking and streaming.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook Flip CX1400FKA-DS84FT - Touchscreen Laptop
item.description: The ASUS Chromebook Flip CX1400FKA-DS84FT is a lightweight and versatile laptop designed for everyday computing needs.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 11 C732-C6WU - Chrome OS Laptop
item.description: Compact and portable Chromebook ideal for cloud-based and web-focused activities, featuring efficient performance and durable build quality.

item.title: HP Chromebook 14 3PD87UT#ABA - Gray Chrome OS Laptop
item.description: A HP Chromebook designed for productivity with Intel Celeron performance, 8 GB RAM, 32 GB storage, and Chrome OS in a durable, lightweight body.

item.title: HP Chromebook 14 1A715UT#ABA - Gray Chrome OS Laptop
item.description: Compact and lightweight Chromebook for productivity and basic multimedia needs.

item.title: Acer Chromebook Spin 312 CP312-1HN-34Z7 Convertible Laptop
item.description: This 12.2-inch convertible Chromebook by Acer features a powerful Intel Core i3-N305 processor, fast LPDDR5 RAM, and ample eMMC storage. It is designed for versatility and productivity with a touchscreen display, Wi-Fi 6E, and robust connectivity options.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go XE340XDA-KA8US - 14-inch HD Laptop Silver
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go is a lightweight and affordable Chromebook equipped with an Intel Celeron N4500 processor, 4GB RAM, and 288GB of combined storage.
